item.content:encoded:
[templates.add add]
[template.set_array ack status="error" int_reason="release_title is not provided." reason="title is required." /] [template.return template.ack empty='{template.release_title}' /]
[template.set_array ack status="error" int_reason="release_note is not provided." reason="Release note is required." /] [template.return template.ack empty='{template.release_note}' /]
[template.set note_id="RELN{unique_number}" /]
[template.set_array meta_arr.new meta_key="release_note_id" meta_value="{template.note_id}" coll_type="release_note" /]
[template.set_array meta_arr.new meta_key="release_title" meta_value="{template.release_title}" coll_type="release_note" /] [template.set_array meta_arr.new meta_key="release_note" meta_value="{template.release_note}" coll_type="release_note" /]
[date.create now date_format='Y-m-d H:i:s' set=template.current_dt /] [template.set_array meta_arr.new meta_key="note_created_by" meta_value="{current_user.user_email}" coll_type="release_note" /] [template.set_array meta_arr.new meta_key="note_created_datetime" meta_value="{template.current_dt}" coll_type="release_note" /]
[db.meta.update_object_meta meta="{template.meta_arr}" meta_table="plot" object_id="{template.note_id}" coll_id='release' set='template.ack' /]
[template.set ack=""/] [template.set_array ack status="success" int_reason="note added successfully!" note_id="{template.note_id}" /] [template.return template.ack /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add single] [db.meta.select_meta_key_value_pair meta_table="plot" coll_id="{template.release_note_id}" set="template.note_meta" /] [template.return template.note_meta /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add list]
[env.set search="{template.search}" /]
[module.set_array query] [pagesize][template.pagesize default=20 /][/pagesize] [pageno][template.pageno default=1 /][/pageno] [with] [sql] SELECT object_id as data_id FROM plot WHERE coll_id="release" AND coll_type="release_note" AND meta_key="release_note_id" [/sql] [filter new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as created_datetime from [module.previous_query_no /] join plot on [module.previous_query_no /].data_id = plot.object_id where meta_key='note_created_datetime' [/sql] [/filter] [filter new not_empty="{{env.get search}}"] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* from plot join [module.previous_query_no /] on [module.previous_query_no /].data_id=plot.object_id and coll_type="release_note" where meta_key IN ("note_title","note_description") and meta_value LIKE '%[env.get search /]%' group by data_id [/sql] [/filter] [/with] [transform ref_id=data_id /] [meta new] [table]plot[/table] [meta_keys]release_note_id,release_title,release_note,note_created_datetime,modified_on,note_created_by[/meta_keys] [id_field]object_id[/id_field] [/meta] [order] created_datetime DESC [/order] [/module.set_array] [db.meta_query query="{module.query}" set="template.get_releases" /] [template.return template.get_releases /] [/templates.add]
